mapper.select: SELECT BEM_BEVAL_IDX , BOARD_IDX , EVAL_OPINION , EVAL_SCORE1 , EVAL_SCORE2 , EVAL_SCORE3 , EVAL_SCORE4 , EVAL_SCORE5 , EVAL_SCORE6 , EVAL_SCORE7 , EVAL_SCORE8 , EVAL_TOTALSCORE , EVAL_WRITER , WRITER_ID , BPM_BPLAN_IDX , REG_DATE , MOD_DATE FROM EMP_BEM_BEVAL WHERE 1=1 AND BPM_BPLAN_IDX = #{bpm_bplan_idx} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY BEM_BEVAL_IDX DESC

SELECT BEM_BEVAL_IDX , EVAL_OPINION , EVAL_SCORE1 , EVAL_SCORE2 , EVAL_SCORE3 , EVAL_SCORE4 , EVAL_SCORE5 , EVAL_SCORE6 , EVAL_SCORE7 , EVAL_SCORE8 , WRITER_ID , EVAL_TOTALSCORE , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') , EVAL_WRITER FROM EMP_BEM_BEVAL WHERE 1=1 AND BEM_BEVAL_IDX = #{bem_beval.idx} AND DEL_YN ='N'
mapper.update: UPDATE EMP_BEM_BEVAL SET EVAL_SCORE1 = #{eval_score1}, EVAL_SCORE2 = #{eval_score2}, EVAL_SCORE3 = #{eval_score3}, EVAL_SCORE4 = #{eval_score4}, EVAL_SCORE5 = #{eval_score5}, EVAL_SCORE6 = #{eval_score6}, EVAL_SCORE7 = #{eval_score7}, EVAL_SCORE8 = #{eval_score8}, EVAL_TOTALSCORE = #{eval_totalscore}, EVAL_OPINION = #{eval_opinion} WHERE BEM_BEVAL_IDX = #{bem_beval_idx}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(BPM_BPLAN_IDX) FROM EMP_BPM_BPLAN WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
AND BPM_BPLAN_IDX > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMP_FILE( FILE_IDX, BOARD_IDX, BOARD_LIST_IDX, FILE_FNAME, FILE_SNAME, FILE_SIZE )VALUES( SEQ_FILE_IDX.NEXTVAL, 2, #{bem_bplan_idx}, #{file_fname}, #{file_sname}, #{file_size} )
mapper.select:
SELECT FILE_IDX, FILE_FNAME, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE
FROM EMP_FILE WHERE BOARD_LIST_IDX = #{bem_bplan_idx} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY FILE_IDX ASC
SELECT FILE_SNAME, FILE_FNAME FROM EMP_FILE WHERE FILE_IDX = #{FILE_IDX}

SELECT BEM_BEVAL_IDX , BOARD_IDX , EVAL_OPINION , EVAL_SCORE1 , EVAL_SCORE2 , EVAL_SCORE3 , EVAL_SCORE4 , EVAL_SCORE5 , EVAL_SCORE6 , EVAL_SCORE7 , EVAL_SCORE8 , EVAL_TOTALSCORE , EVAL_WRITER , WRITER_ID , BPM_BPLAN_IDX , REG_DATE , MOD_DATE FROM EMP_BEM_BEVAL WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND WRITER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY BEM_BEVAL_IDX DESC

SELECT BEM_BEVAL_FORM_IDX , BAM_ANC_IDX , EVAL_FORM_TITLE , EVAL_FORM_ITEM , EVAL_FORM_SCORE FROM EMP_BEM_BEVAL_FORM WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND BAM_ANC_IDX = #{bam_anc_idx} ORDER BY BEM_BEVAL_FORM_IDX ASC

SELECT BEM_BEVAL_IDX , BOARD_IDX , EVAL_OPINION , EVAL_SCORE1 , EVAL_SCORE2 , EVAL_SCORE3 , EVAL_SCORE4 , EVAL_SCORE5 , EVAL_SCORE6 , EVAL_SCORE7 , EVAL_SCORE8 , EVAL_TOTALSCORE , EVAL_WRITER , WRITER_ID , BPM_BPLAN_IDX , REG_DATE , MOD_DATE FROM EMP_BEM_BEVAL WHERE 1=1 AND BPM_BPLAN_IDX = #{bpm_bplan_idx} AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND WRITER_ID = #{writer_id} ORDER BY BEM_BEVAL_IDX DESC
